message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. I take $7500 and Bob takes $2500. This offers a fair split considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60-40 split. I think this is a fair compromise given the inflation factor.

Considering the inflation, I propose a 64:36 split. I take $6400 and Bob takes $3600. This maintains a reasonable difference in our shares while accounting for the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
